) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT b.BOOK_NO bookNo, b.BOOK_TITLE bookTitle, b.BOOK_AUTHOR bookAuthor, b.BOOK_PUBLISHER bookPublisher, TO_CHAR(b.BOOK_PUB_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') bookPubDate, b.BOOK_ISBN bookIsbn, b.BOOK_PRICE bookPrice, b.BOOK_DESCRIPTION bookDescription, b.BOOK_COVER bookCover, b.BOOK_CREATE_DATE bookCreateDate, b.BOOK_UPDATE_DATE bookUpdateDate, b.BOOK_AMOUNT bookAmount, b.BOOK_STATUS bookAmount, b.CATEGORY_ID categoryId, t.TOP_CATEGORY_NAME topCategoryName, u.UPPER_CATEGORY_NAME upperCategoryName, m.MID_CATEGORY_NAME midCategoryName, l.LOWER_CATEGORY_NAME lowerCategoryName, d.DETAIL_NO detailNo, d.DETAIL_IMAGE detailImage, d.DETAIL_DESCRIPTION detailDescription FROM BOOK b LEFT JOIN LOWER_CATEGORY l ON b.CATEGORY_ID = l.LOWER_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN MID_CATEGORY m ON l.MID_CATEGORY_NO = m.MID_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN UPPER_CATEGORY u ON m.UPPER_CATEGORY_NO = u.UPPER_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN TOP_CATEGORY t ON u.TOP_CATEGORY_NO = t.TOP_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN BOOK_DETAIL d ON b.BOOK_NO = d.BOOK_NO WHERE (b.BOOK_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR b.BOOK_AUTHOR LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
